title: Android Developer
jobDescription:
We are looking for an Android Developer who possesses a passion for pushing mobile technologies to the limits. This Android app developer will work with our team of talented engineers to design and build the next generation of our mobile applications. Android programming works closely with other app development and technical teams.

Responsibilities
  • Design and build advanced applications for the Android platform.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
  • FaWork with outside data sources and APIs.
  • Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
  • Work on bug fixing and improving application performance.
  • Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.
Key Skills
  • Java
  • OOPs Concepts
  • XML
  • Material Designs
  • Android SDK
  • Android Basic Concepts
  • Deep understanding of Activity lifecycle and Fragment Lifecycle in Android
  • Android Studio IDE
  • API Integration
  • Retrofit
  • MVVM
  • RXJava
  • Live Data
  • Google Maps Integratio
  • Social Login
  • Background and Foreground Services in Android
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • Third-Party Libraries Integration
  • Google Place API Integration
  • Firebase Integration
  • Room Database
  • Media Player in Android
  • Knowledge of uploading app on google play store
  • Firebase Analytics and Facebook analytics

title: Flutter Developer
tagsAndSkills: System testing,Product engineering,Backend,Mobile development,Machine learning,Agile,Technical architecture,Mobile applications
jobDescription:
We are looking for ambitious hands-on engineers who love building Mobile Apps from the ground up and have a special affection for all things IoT integration An ideal fit is a person with an insatiable appetite for learning and exploring new technologies and one who is forever looking to bring improvement in the way they work, with technology to help. Own the user experience implementation along with the product designers, contribute towards simplifying the experience.

Collaborate with product, engineering, domain experts to synthesize complex ideas and turn it into mobile user experiences Quick iterations with the rest of the team to implement new features Develop and refine the technical architecture used by Flutter development teams. Develop and maintain complex components of information systems. Create and perform unit tests, as well as resolve and retest any defects identified.

Develop and perform system testing and fix defects identified during testing and re-execute unit tests to validate results. Diagnose and troubleshoot performance and other issues. Candidate should have 4 years of IT industry and 3+ years of experience in mobile development Ability to do rapid prototyping to demonstrate ideas (using any tool of your choice)

Experience in Flutter mobile applications (iOS/Android) and native Android applications. Technical Expertise in Flutter and React.JS. Knowing to react for the web is a bonus Experience working with RESTful APIs to connect to back-end services Experience in Mobile integration ( Mobile App and third-party tools) Experience in an agile environment

The ideal candidate is expected to be experienced in the mobility space, specifically using traditional and new and emerging technologies. Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to collaborate effectively with domain experts and IT leadership team is key to be successful in this role. Having developed on products that involved AI / Machine learning will be added advantage

title: Full Stack Developer React Node
jobDescription:
• Participate the development process;
  • Cooperate with QA team;
  • Recognize opportunities to improve code efficiency;
  • Perform code peer-to-peer reviews;
  • Contribute to software architecture planning;
  • Maintain code and documentation integrity and organization;
  • Help project owner in estimating new features;
  • Keep up with emerging trends and technologies;
  • Accurately match UI/UX design;
  • Participate in various team-buildings and non-development activities (Risks identification, Threats Modeling, etc.)
  • Build reusable components.
Requirements:
  • 4+ years of commercial experience;
  • Strong knowledge of JavaScript (ES5, ES6+), HTML5, CSS3;
  • Good understanding of CSS Preprocessors, such as LESS and Sass;
  • Experience with React/Redux is a must;
  • Experience with TypeScript;
  • Upper-Intermediate English;
  • Strong knowledge in Node.js (Express);
  • Experience working in an Agile environment (Scrum or Kanban);
  • Experience with build tools, code coverage, and testing frameworks Webpack, jest etc.;
  • Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases PostgreSQL, MongoDB;
  • Strong Knowledge with Rest API;
  • Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git;
  • Experience with Redis, ElasticSearch.
Nice to have:
  • Experience with CI/CD;
  • Experience with serverless, FaaS and PaaS (AWS Lambda);
  • Understanding of SDLC and ISMS.

title: iOS Developer
tagsAndSkills: Product management,Memory management,Integration testing,Agile,Application development,Product design,application architecture,Management
jobDescription:
We is looking for an iOS app developer having 2 to 5 years experience in developing mobile applications for iOS devices. Prior experience in developing native iOS apps is a must.

Responsibilities :

Designs and codes features for the iOS application as per the specifications provided by Product and Design teams.

Writes unit tests for all features.

Ships features in fast moving agile sprints.

Works closely with API, Product Design and Product Management teams to brainstorm and chalk out details of features.

Understanding of complete application development, continuous integration testing and app distribution infrastructure.

Requirements

1. Software Developer with at least 3 years of experience in building apps for the iOS platform.

2. Good understanding of Swift.

3. Good understanding of iOS application architecture and design.

4. Good understanding of memory management, network interaction, concurrency and multi-threading in iOS.

5. Good understanding of Foundation and UIKit APIs.

6. Good understanding of Objective-C language.

7. Past experience of building apps based on AVKit or AVFoundation APIs.

8. Past experience of building video streaming apps.

9. Past experience of working with third party libraries and dependency management on iOS.
